name: Sign Up & Login
options: Customers can create accounts on your website using 1 of 1 or 1 of 2 methods available: Facebook, Amazon, Twitter, Google, Email Address, Username and *Phone Number (*extra charges for sms verification).

name: Submit Bookings
options: Account holders can create and submit bookings through your website.

name: View Submitted Bookings
options: Account holders can access their booking records on your website.

name: Save & Edit Booking Details
options: Customers can ease the booking process by pre-filling booking details. Users can save their Name, Address, Contact Phone, Contact email.
